'''''Too Hot to Handle!''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To obtain this achievement, the player needs force a [[Tainted Hydro Phantasm]] to enter its enraged state by [[Frozen|freezing]] it for 8 seconds in total.
